titles.title: Condemning the launching by the Democratic People's Republic of Korea of a ballistic missile in violation of Japanese air space, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 9/10/1998--Introduced. Condemns the launching by the Democratic People's Republic of Korea of a medium range ballistic missile in violation of Japanese air space. Calls upon the President to: (1) seriously reevaluate the current policies of the United States toward that country; and (2) relay to that country the serious concerns of the House of Representatives regarding the missile launch and the ramifications such missile launches could have on future food and energy assistance.
